attributes.action: Allow the electorate the final decision over MP's Allowances by resigning and calling an immediate General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frustrated by inreasing number of MP's being called to answer allegations of over claiming is it not time the electorate had it's say? The PM has said he is ready to listen to the Electorate - then let the electorate speak!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
